column1: Barad Nimras (Sindarin Tower of the White Horn) was a tower on a headland westward of Eglarest built by Finrod. Its purpose was to watch the western seas
column2: and warn of any naval attack by Morgoths forces. As Morgoth never mounted any attack from the ocean
column3: the tower was never in fact needed.

column1: In the year after the Nirnaeth Arnoediad
column3: Morgoth did launch Fall of the Falas on Eglarest and Brithombar
column4: and Barad Nimras was torn down at that time by the very foes it was meant to guard against.

column1: Barad Nimras is a Sindarin name from barad "tower"
column2: nimp "white" and ras "horn". It may be a reference to the tower itself
column3: or perhaps to the narrow cape on which it stood.
